title: Drawing, Design for Dining Table "A" of Mahogany on Baluster-Like Support, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Dining Table "A" of Mahogany on Baluster-Like Support
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: DINING TABLE 'A' / OF MAHOGANY; at upper right of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4.' 6" diam" / to extend to 12'
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded top with dividing stretcher running across center, raised on baluster-like support on rectangular platform, sitting atop molded "X"-shaped base terminating in scroll-like feet on casters.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Dining Table "A" of Mahogany on Baluster-Like Support, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-176
